alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:39PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sierra County through 615 PM MDT... At 538 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles north of Engle, moving east at 55 mph. Thunderstorm outflow well ahead of the storm may also produce wind gusts. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern White Sands Missile Range, Salinas Peak and Rock House. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes
